title: A. Thesis
stimulusHtml:
1 point

States a thesis that directly addresses all parts of the question. The thesis must do more than restate the question.

0 points

Does not state a thesis that directly addresses all parts of the question or has a thesis that merely restates the question.
descriptions: Does not state a thesis that directly addresses all parts of the question or has a thesis that merely restates the question.
States a thesis that directly addresses all parts of the question. The thesis must do more than restate the question.

title: B. Analysis of historical evidence and support of argument
stimulusHtml:
Analysis of documents (0-3 points)

3 points

Offers plausible analysis of BOTH the content of all or all but one of the documents, explicitly using this analysis to support the stated thesis or a relevant argument; AND at least one of the following for all or all but one of the documents:

• intended audience,

• purpose,

• historical context, and/or

• the author’s point of view

2 points

Offers plausible analysis of BOTH the content of a majority of the documents, explicitly using this analysis to support the stated thesis or a relevant argument; AND at least one of the following for the majority of the documents:

• intended audience,

• purpose,

• historical context, and/or

• the author’s point of view

1 point

Offers plausible analysis of the content of a majority of the documents, explicitly using this analysis to support the stated thesis or a relevant argument

AND/OR

Analysis of outside examples to support thesis/argument (0–1 point)

1 point

Offers plausible analysis of historical examples beyond/outside the documents to support the stated thesis or a relevant argument.

0 points

Response does not offer plausible analysis of a majority of the documents or does not use this analysis to support the stated thesis or a relevant argument. Response does not offer plausible analysis of historical examples beyond/outside the documents to support the stated thesis or a relevant argument.
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

title: C. Contextualization
stimulusHtml:
1 point

Accurately and explicitly connects historical phenomena relevant to the argument to broader historical events and/or processes.

0 points

Response does not accurately and explicitly connect historical phenomena relevant to the argument to broader historical events and/or processes.
descriptions: Response does not accurately and explicitly connect historical phenomena relevant to the argument to broader historical events and/or processes.
Accurately and explicitly connects historical phenomena relevant to the argument to broader historical events and/or processes.

title: D. Synthesis
stimulusHtml:
1 point

Appropriately extends or modifies the stated thesis or argument.

OR

Recognizes and effectively accounts for disparate, sometimes contradictory, evidence from primary sources and/or secondary works in crafting a coherent argument

OR

Appropriately connects the topic of the question to other historical periods, geographical areas, contexts, or circumstances.

0 points

Response does not synthesize the argument, evidence, analysis of documents, and context into a coherent and persuasive essay.
descriptions: Response does not synthesize the argument, evidence, analysis of documents, and context into a coherent and persuasive essay.

Appropriately extends or modifies the stated thesis or argument.

OR

Recognizes and effectively accounts for disparate, sometimes contradictory, evidence from primary sources and/or secondary works in crafting a coherent argument

OR

Appropriately connects the topic of the question to other historical periods, geographical areas, contexts, or circumstances.
